body.text: - You could coordinate a plan of action together. - It could be meaningful to learn you are not the only one. - It could be beneficial to put your campus on notice that you are not the only victim, which might lead to more reasonable measures if the campus is not taking actions to protect other students against the repeat offender.

- You may be putting yourself at risk by sharing intimate details or by relying on someone who may have different motivations than you. - You have no control over what the other person will do or who they might tell. - It could be futile and may be more frustrating if they decide not to take action and you don't have more support for your case.
